version_description: • Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Roofs objects were added to the catalog!

• UI updates for iPhone X

• Improved 3D rendering speed
• Improved furniture controls in 3D

• Project will save selected floor

• Fixed crash during projects sync
• Fixed crash when saving project screenshot to Photos app

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Roofs objects were added to the catalog!

• Improved furniture controls in 3D

• Project will save selected floor

• Fixed issues with selecting furniture in 2D

• Some minor bug fixes and improvements.

• Improved 3D graphics quality and performance.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Improved 3D graphics quality and performance.

• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Updated selection box in 3D editor (now more visible).
• Fixed texture scaling and rotating.
• Fixed bug where closed doors were invisible.

• Fixed issue where pool water was gray
• Fixed magical cube texture scaling issues

Other recent improvements:

• Updated selection box in 3D editor (now more visible)

• Fixed issue where pool water was gray
• Fixed magical cube texture scaling issues

Other recent improvements:

• Updated selection box in 3D editor (now more visible)

• Improved the purchasing experience
• Fixed issues with textures on a magical cube

• Localization updates

To protect your privacy, we’ve ensured Planner 5D is fully compliant with GDPR, the European Union’s new data protection rules.
Now it’s easier than ever for you to control your personal data.

• Fixed bug where models would not download.

To protect your privacy, we’ve ensured Planner 5D is fully compliant with GDPR, the European Union’s new data protection rules.
Now it’s easier than ever for you to control your personal data.

• Fixed bug where models would not download.

Adjustable wall thickness and beautifull room corners are here! Now you can create that Bastion Fort that you always wanted.

• Support for iOS 12

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• All furniture now snaps to walls
• Added ability to choose editor style between light and dark modes

• UI/UX improvements

• Fixed rare crash when opening project
• Fixed rare crash when launching application
• Fixed rare issue where project/snapshot thumbnails were not visible

• Fixed rare crash while trying to render project in 3D

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Brand new AR experience (available on iOS 13):
• Preview the project, you've just built, on your table or place it outside and walk through the real sized house using your iPhone or iPad
• Collaborative Sessions. Create new project, open AR and experience your new house with your friends and family by allowing them to join your session

• Dark Mode support for iOS 13
• Fixed rare issue where catalog menu is not visible on iOS 12

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Fixed rare crash when opening project
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Paths and Lawns now have visible selection indicator
• Faster 3D rendering for some users with large projects

• Catalog and textures updates

• Fixed rare crashes with older iOS versions
• Fixed rare issue where newly added furniture would be place too far from the camera
• Fixed rare issue when dragging furniture item didn't work in 3D
• Fixed rare issue where doors were not transparent

• Bug fixes and performance improvements
• Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Brand new furniture bounding box in 2D, which makes resizing and rotating your furniture easier than ever before

• Added more than 100 of new textures!
• Added more than 200 of new furniture items!

• More precise and predicable furniture movement in 3D

• Fixed rare crash when presenting AR tutorial
• Fixed rare crash when updating AR wall
• Fixed incorrect position when adding new furniture item in 2D
• Fixed missing refresh control in projects browser
• Fixed rare issue where iPhone/iPad rotation caused furniture catalog to disappear

Other recent changes:

• New Interface
A clean and refined interface simplifies interior design
Furniture and customizations are more accessible and easier to find

• New Augmented Reality experience
